text: (Ima) arrā no omoto kara keiten (kuruān) ga kudasa rete, kare-ra ga shoji shite ita mono o sarani kakunin dekiru yō ni nattaga,―― izen kara fushinjin no mono ni taishi shōri o o sazuke kudasai to negatte ita ni mo kakawarazu ―― kokoro ni omotte ita mono ga jissai ni kudaru to, kare-ra wa sono shinkō o kyohi suru. Arrā no kenseki wa kanarazu fushinjin-sha no ue ni kudarudearou
